Aug. 2, 1909 D Hexham March Contest
Hexham March Contest 0 March Contest (Music and Inspection Points)
hexham-march-contest
None
Hexham, Northumberland, England, UK Prizes 1st £2, 2nd £1 divided between Spencer's and St Hilda. Held in conjunction with Hexham Contest held same day. 7 bands competed.
Nov. 6, 2012, 11:29 a.m. Nov. 13, 2017, 9:19 a.m.
